body:
When I downloaded the mod all the features worked perfectly but my screen is completely black

I tried:
  • Refreshing chunks
  • taking off texture pack
  • reinstalling forge
  • Deleted other mods (May affect this mod)
    ETC

title: BetterPvP mod help!!!!

replies.body:
have you tried getting a fresh minecraft file (backup .minecraft of course to get it back) get new forge and mod
maybe you need a new GPU (mods such as shaders require resources)
maybe the mod isnt fully compatible with the forge you got
replies.body_tagged:
have you tried getting a fresh minecraft file (backup .minecraft of course to get it back) get new forge and mod
maybe you need a new GPU (mods such as shaders require resources)
maybe the mod isnt fully compatible with the forge you got

replies.body: Have you checked your FOV? Last time that happened to me that I got a black screen it was because my FOV went to 0 for some random reason
replies.body_tagged: Have you checked your FOV? Last time that happened to me that I got a black screen it was because my FOV went to 0 for some random reason

replies.body: If I were you, I would look up a video of how to download it. I used to use this mod around a year ago. Incredible mod xP
